# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I propose an offer of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic worth but also the opportunity to secure it now at a premium rate. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
